pages.text: Witches are powerful spellcasters who can manipulate the elements, brew potions, and cast deadly curses.

pages.title: Witch Abilities
pages.text:
- Fireball 
- Ice Wall 
- Arcane Storm 
- Chaos Hex

pages.title: Rituals & Magic
pages.text: Witches can perform powerful rituals, from summoning entities to empowering themselves with dark forces.
